message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it very valuable. I'm asking for $130.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $110?
Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within a budget.  How about we meet in the middle at $120?
